Jogo muito divertido para quem busca algo que seja "desafiador" e divertido (ainda mais com amigos).
Não é um jogo enjoativo por conta das inúmeras opções de jogabilidade e seleção de perks, porém, o jogo possibilita missões diversificadas para O KILLER ou SUVIVER poderem concluir durante a partida.. e, para quem bosta de roupinhas, o jogo ainda conta com um SEASON PASS (que tem um custo, obviamente.)

Gameplay is fun and rewarding! It's difficult getting into it as the community can be a little unreceptive to new players, but the noticeable progress in skill is plenty to keep you going game to game, regardless of the side you play.

Some french guy told me to play this, then he got mad for not doing good at it. He told me go back playing fps shooters shooters you tities (notice: he said it with french accent). Other then that, there is Michael Mires in there. The funny horror guy that gets featured in Family Guy.
You ever watch Monsters, Inc.? Did you like it? This game is just like that except completely different.

This game was once a fun and casual experience. That all changed when MMR was implemented. I get sweaty survivors every game now, giving me no chance to improve (even with low tier killers mind you). Either add a casual game mode or roll back MMR, because games with RNG factors (pallet, totem and generator spawns) aren't made for a competitive scene.

It's been an absolute pleasure seeing this game evolve from the basic BETA it was in 2016 into the well-polished cat vs mice gem it is today. The devs have done a stand-up job at continually keeping things fresh with new killers, survivors and perks, while maintaining a relatively balanced gameplay through the years. Anyone searching for a satisfyingly bloody thriller they can casually play with their fellow sick and twisted heathen friends need not look further.
很好玩的一个游戏，价格也不高，十分有趣

Loads of content added so it will keep you coming back for more.

Great game, good fun with friends

Dead by Daylight is one of the best multiplayer game you will find on steam,  it is very fun to play with friends but if you chose to play alone you will have tons of fun as well. 
The game is really easy to learn but hard to master, it is visually beautiful (if you disconsider the torn faces and bloody corpses), you can play the same game but in various different styles and is really hard to get bored with it. Even if you don't like horror games, you'll be able to play it without many scares. 
All in all, the game is amazing and I recommend it.

O jogo é bem feito, não há grande número de bugs, é muito divertido e muito melhor se jogado com amigos. Está em constante evolução e mudanças. É o jogo perfeito para quem busca uma emoção um pouco mais voltada para o terror de forma suavizada e coisas como sentir a perseguição de um monstro ou alguém tentando te matar enquanto você tem que se esconder e sobreviver de forma estratégica (sem muita complexidade). É o jogo perfeito para quem quer o equilíbrio entre terror e ação.
Love the game played for a while, can't wait to start playing this game again when I get a new PC

This game has been released for a while now. Yet the developers cant figure out a way to make it balanced and worth while to play. The whole of objective of this game is overall fun but ONLY when your not being tunneled or camped by a killer which happens WAYYYY too often. Not to mention imstead of fixing the bugs within the game they decide to release dlc that just makes the game more buggy. Overall this game is only worth the buy if you plan to play with friends the majority of the time. Im not even gonna start on the killer side this game just need MASSIVE fixes before you spend you money!
It's very funny camping survivors and then seeing them rage in end game chat. 10/10, would buy again
If you are looking for a crazy thrilling experience, then this is the game for you!
the game is super awesome for multiplayer, and the fact that there are new killers being added makes it even cooler
Addicting, but not worth the money in its current state. Wait until the developers get their shit together.

Лучшая в своем жанре игра . Предоставляет возможность  сыграть как за убийцу так и выжившего .Но так же есть другая сторона медали как общие проблемы так и проблемы конкретных сторон                               
 Начнем  с общих проблем :                                                                                                                                                                   1. Баги и все возможные ошибки  как за выжившего  так и киллера .                                                                                                
2.  Нестабильные выделеные сервера  которые мешают играть как маньякам так и выжившим .                                                    3. Токсичное комьюнити  с обоих сторон .                                                                                                                                        
Проблемы игры за выживших :                                                                                                                                                         
1. Зависимость от команды . Если хотите  решить эту проблему стоит играть в команде друзей с дискордом                                                                                                                                                  
2. Фейскемперы ( маньяки по каким либо причинам стоящих в упор к крюку и не дают  вас снять ) . Эту проблему решает так же команда друзей с дискордом  так как снять будет проще если действувать обговоря все детали спасения                         
3. ( Дело вкуса ) Иногда однообразный геймплей в виде завода генераторов .                                                                          
Проблемы игры за маньяка :                                                                                                            )                                            
1. Маньяки слабее команды с дискордом . Решить проблему частично можно играя на более сильных маньяках , а так же играть  более жеско : кемпить ( патрулировать крюк ) и туннеля ( бежать за выжившим которого сняли в целях его быстрого убийства ) Предупреждаю такой вид геймплея не одобряеться выжившими и скорее всего вас назовут нубом и так далее но что бы играть за киллеров в дбд нужно полностью забить на мнение выживших  .                                                                                                                          2. Генраш ( быстрый завод генераторов ) который выплывает зачастую с первого пункта . Проблему так же частично может помочь решить кемп и туннелинг на ряду с патрулированием 3 оставшихся генераторов которые розположены не далеко друг от друга ( перед этим нужно заставить выживших завести генераторы так что бы получился так называемый триугольник )                                                                                                                                                                             
Вот и все что я хотел россказать о дбд . Надеюсь что этим обзором я вам как то помог . Не смотря на все выше перечисленное   я все же рекомендую вам попробовать сыграть в эту игру если вам нравиться такой жанр .

999 hours later~* What I know:

-A bit of a learning curve if you want to be competitive, but the game does okay at pairing you with people around your skill level... but just okay, lol. It has improved from what it use to be though. I really recommend approaching it casually, and if you enjoy it, competitively later. Improvement takes a couple of hundred hours, and I've met some who will tell you 1k+. Killer is much harder than survivor, though both take skill. It's also good to play both at least occasionally, as it's a big advantage knowing how the other side works.
-Grindy, grindy, grindy, and I don't mind grind, but it's a grind. I can't remember how long it took me to get one fully prestiged character with all the unlocked perks, but I'm guessing around 500. Survivors aren't so bad in this regard because all survivors play the same mostly (unless you count model advantages), so a lot of people opt to do it to one survivor. However, killers all play differently, so the grind is massive if you want to do it to all killers. I'd suggest just aiming for perks you really like and moving on.
-Devs think they are "doing a pretty good job so far" (the infamous quote) -- and I agree. One of the best games I've played that at least tries to stay close with their player base. Regular events and new content too. There are issues at times but they do compensate often, and all non-linear games have issues. Customer service isn't bad either, and their official forums have people you can talk to straight at BHVR.
-There is a ton of developer created lore with their own characters / universe, and a lot of franchises are involved like Halloween, Stranger Things (or use to be), Nightmare on Elm Street, etc. 
-Not P2W or gacha-y. Points and perks can only be obtained from grinding. Mostly monetized by new chapters with character / map releases, the tomes VIP version (just for costumes), and the cosmetics shop. Good costumes too for most characters.
-Very active communities, at least on just about every media platform I'm on. Not hard to find strangers to play with, or get information. Toxicity is a thing, but I don't find it rampant, and you can even turn chats off if it really bothers you. DBD has a huge following on Twitch as well. I'd suggest Otzdarva, and emote him a larva.
-Hands down, one of my favorite games ever with friends. Second game I've really been able to get my non-gamer husband into, too. Even my kids play on the PS5. The only person I've had play that doesn't enjoy it is not so much of a fan of horror or adrenaline inducing games.
-You will lose the fear factor for the most part, but at least for me the jump scares are never ending. The initial fear factor though is so fun.
-I laugh a lot, for better or worse.

Although I've played this game for only two years, the Dead by Daylight experience has always been great...

Until the past few months.

I believe that the 5th year of Dead by Daylight has brought forward the worst changes to the game so far. 
-RCPD was a convoluted mess that frequently had to be disabled due to technical issues.
-Nemesis' zombies would sometimes get stuck in places.
[strike] -Cenobite' voice lines were removed for some reason, and it looks like they're not coming back. [/strike] I was right, the new voicelines are different, fuck you
-MMR has eventually sucked the fun out of matches and using non-meta builds became a death sentence.
-The introduction of boon totems has presented further inequality between survivors and killers. EDIT: Well BHVR is putting some effort into fixing this so maybe disregard it?
-Model reworks of characters have shown mixed results.
-The Artist is the 4th killer in a row with a ranged ability (5 if you count Twins), exposing BHVR's depleting creativity.
-Losing the Stranger Things license is a worrisome development which puts the other licenses in doubt as well.

Sad to say that you're not doing a pretty good job anymore, Behaviour.
Woke LGBTQIA2+ garbage ruined a cool horror game
